name: Yarn (itch) (O4FoxSake)
description:
You were just playing around with a ball of yarn, but suddenly you realised you got all tangled up! Dash into the yarn to bump it into objects, dragging your tethered self along with it, and racking up a highscore to show off on the online leaderboard!

Made for the 127th Mini Jam.

Attributions:

Cat animations - https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-cat-sprites

Background music - https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-lofi-ice-cave

Meows - https://freesound.org/people/Fishdog/sounds/39990/

Death meow - https://freesound.org/people/Counter-gamer/sounds/213889/
